posts.post_title: FS or FT 1910 T212 Obaks - Prices Reduced
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andy Cook
$20 each delivered, or all 8 for $125, or will trade for T212-2s and T210s I need. Thanks, Andy typecard@aol.com
The backs are in the same relative order as the fronts in the scans.

Capron Vancouver
Danzig Sacramento
Hall Tacoma
Hetling Portland
Hollis Sacramento
Scharnweber Vancouver
Steen Portland
Williams San Francisco
